name: Baby pegasus magic
description: One day, it was released in summer 2007, only you can take care of her, when you click on spoon and fork, then you have to feed her with apples, if content reaches even more then -1 then she is giggling, when you click on shower, then you have to wash her, click the clonthes icon to change her dress, and when you click on the bed, then it's gotta be sleeping, and when you tap on the blanket to wake her up, then you woke her up, it's just like tamagotchi with a narrator, when narrator talks some content, so try it out now for more information on joey-enterprices-inc.itch.io
